original_text: When they are one month old, you must buy them from me for five shekels of silver each. The shekel must have the same weight as the shekel that the Levites use in God's Holy Tent. There are 20 gerahs in one shekel.
korean_text: 그 사람을 대속할 때에는 난 지 한 달 이후에 네가 정한 대로 성소의 세겔을 따라 은 다섯 세겔로 대속하라 한 세겔은 이십 게라이니라

sentences.original_text: When they are one month old,
you must buy them from me
for five shekels of silver each.
The shekel must have the same weight
as the shekel that the Levites use
There are 20 gerahs in one shekel.
